project_descr: Promote the conservation and long-term sustainable use of marine-coastal biodiversity of global importance through effectively managed marine-coastal protected areas (MPAs), which will contribute to improving the economic welfare of the Guatemalans

outputs.output_descr: Conservation and sustainable use of marine and coastal biodiversity through effectively and equitably managed marine-coastal protected areas, which will contribute to improving the economic welfare of the Guatemalan population.
